)

Arduino node

This node is a modification of the code of the rosserial_server. It will look for any active serial port of an determined standard. (The default is _/dev/ttyACM_) After that, it will try to run a rosserial communication with the device connected to this serial port. If it respond, it is a programmed Arduino.

Each Arduino connected will be ran into a specific thread. (1 Thread for 1 Arduino)
